metadata.title: PM, Saad Rafique discuss political situation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 31 (APP): Senior leader of Pakistan Muslim League (N) and former Federal Minister for Railways Khawaja Saad Rafique called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday and discussed the political situation in the country. Khawaja Saad Rafique paid tribute to the Prime Minister for leading the country's economy in a better direction.
